heroSection.title: Welcome to
heroSection.caption: AERX is fundamentally, a new approach to moneytization of creators content

feature1.title: feature1
feature1.caption: Create unique content: text, picture, video or audio

feature2.title: feature2
feature2.description: And get rewarded when other users like it

sub1.caption: It dosen't matter if you are a proffessional artist, just come up with a funny meme, a beginner musician? write lyrics.

sub2.caption: Click 'like' if the content was valuable to you. Thus, you wil send a mini-donation to the creator and motivate him to create new content

feature3.title: feature3
feature3.caption: Create combined posts. Publications that contain creative contents from different authors. Make your posts more intense and earn together

feature4.title: feature4
feature4.caption: To surpport the creators on our patform, an internal utility token is used - æ (aex token) at its core, aex token is aerx fuel. And like any other resource, it can be mined

feature5.title: feature5
feature5.description: To date, there are 2 ways of minning:

sub1.caption: Upon registration, the user recieves a starter package in the amount of 100 æ token

sub2.caption: Create content and share it with other users.

useCase.title: What can i do with aex token?
useCase.first: Withdraw them and exchange them for NEAR
useCase.third: Use them to pay for other aerx services

warning.description: Be active share your ideas and earn. Everyone has ideas and everyone is talented in thier own  way - which means that everyone can earn in aerx!
